title: GameChanger: IPS Program
description: 新規参入者への限定的なインセンティブと複雑なツールでは、Cardanoへの継続的な多言語オンボーディングを保証することはできません。

f6_assessments.q0: Its not clear that paying international influencers to promote a product written in English to non-English speaking communities is the best use of over 1/4 of the multilingual resources challenge funds. How many users does this product currently have in English what we could expect large take up in the non-English speaking community?
f6_assessments.q1: The proposers have already built a product, this proposal is about marketing that product to non-English speaking communities. The biggest question on the ability for this to work is how successful have the proposers been in marketing it to the English speaking world already? Please provide information on current user numbers and growth rates.
f6_assessments.q2: Please provide details on what the influencers are actually being paid do so Catalyst can audit this has been delivered. More importantly, how many users in what languages do you expect to bring on. Set some goals around this so success can be measured. More than just using your gamifies wallet, how will you measure if those users become actively involved with Cardano?

solution: マネタイズされたeラーニングプラットフォームに、ゲーミフィケーションされたウォレットでカルダノを教え、オーガニックな収入を得続けることのできるポピュラーな人たちをシードしよう
experience: 私たちはGameChangerを作りました。これは非常に人間的でゲーム化された財布で、未開発の国で作られた、新参者、学生、建設者にコミットしたものです。
